message.content: {"id": "49536", "title": "If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404", "description": "When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL results in an HTTP response code of 200 OK with no content, rather than the expected HTTP error 404.", "OB": "When a URL is accessed on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP response code of 200 OK with no content.", "EB": "The Tomcat server should return an HTTP error 404 when a URL is accessed on a Tomcat instance with no webapps deployed.", "SR": "To fix this issue, the server should be modified to return the appropriate HTTP error 404 when a URL is accessed on a Tomcat instance with no webapps deployed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '49536', 'title': 'Bug 49536If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404', 'description': 'Ali Tokmenhttp://ali.tokmen.com/ ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': "HelloI've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zipIf I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.CheersS. "}
